About us

Founded in 2008 by two Ukranian partners in Ukrain, Asiaction has become a leading sourcing company in the USA.

Our multicultural approach allows us to work on various international projects with great success.

Read more

Our managing office in Ukraine

Our managing office is located in Kyiv Ukraine. A team of Europeans and Ukranian individuals is at work coordinating our partners and inspectors around Ukraine.
